item.title: Who I am
item.description:
Who am I?

I am Thomas, a Linux enthousiast & hobby developer. I live in Gouda (Netherlands) have some experience with Bash and YAML. I also use VSCode as my IDE and WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) for development. I mostly create hobby projects for my own needs and automate them with Github Actions. For example, I built an config file for an immutable Arch Linux system called BlendOS. You can check it out here.
